name: Covertness
description:
Covertness is a first-person stealth game made by D-Studios. It is a complete game for all ages.

Features:

* 1 Player and 2 Players Modes.

* Enemies. Players can touch to kill enemies. If players are seen by enemies, they lose.

* An excellent soundtrack.

* Stylish UI menues.

Though Covertness doesn't have a saving system, the game is very short and can be completed very quickly in the 1 Player and 2 Players modes.
